Package nl.esciencecenter.octopus.files

This package contains classes and interfaces which are used to provide advanced input and output.

Package nl.esciencecenter.octopus.files Description

This package contains classes and interfaces which are used to provide advanced input and output. Strongly resembles the java.nio.file package. For more basic uses see the nl.esciencecenter.octopus.files package
See Also:
java.nio.file
